#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

long read()
{
	long int i=0;
    char ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch<'0'||ch>'9')
    ch=getchar_unlocked();
    while(ch<='9'&&ch>='0')
    {
    	i=(i<<1)+(i<<3)+ch-'0';
        ch=getchar_unlocked();
    }
    return i;
} 

struct build{
	long h;
	long cost;
};

build height[200010];

int main() {
	long n,i,j,k;
	cin>>n;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++) height[i].h=read();
	height[0].cost=0;
	for(j=1;j<n;j++)
	{
		height[j].cost=height[j-1].cost + abs(height[j].h-height[j-1].h);
		for(k=2;k<=j;k*=2)
			height[j].cost=min(height[j].cost,height[j-k].cost + abs(height[j].h-height[j-k].h));
	}
	cout<<height[n-1].cost<<endl;
	return 0;
}
